snippet.title: Whisper Mountain Outbreak - Coming to Steam 2025
snippet.description:
Whisper Mountain Outbreak is set to release on 2025!

The cursed shadows of Mount Bisik are calling… The relentless mayit hunger for your flesh, their twisted forms lurking in every corner. Weapons are scarce, resources fleeting, and every shadow could be your last. Survival demands you to watch each other’s backs, share every resource, and communicate every move. Solve the mountain’s cryptic puzzles, but never lose sight of your team. Will you and your team have what it takes to escape the mountain’s sinister grasp?

Wishlist the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953230/Whisper_Mountain_Outbreak/

Follow our social media!
https://bsky.app/profile/wmogame.bsky.social
https://www.instagram.com/wmogame/
https://x.com/WMOgame

Join our community!
discord.gg/toge
